name: Fuji Apple
description: Experience the satisfyingly crisp and juicy bite of a premium Fuji Apple. Known for its exceptional sweetness and refreshing flavor, it's a versatile fruit perfect for snacking, slicing into salads, or baking into pies. Sourced directly from the pristine orchards of Himachal, these apples promise freshness in every bite.

name: Cavendish Banana
description: Our Cavendish bananas are naturally ripened to achieve a perfectly creamy and sweet flavor. An excellent source of potassium and a natural energy booster, they are the ideal on-the-go snack for an active lifestyle. Enjoy them on their own, in smoothies, or sliced over your morning cereal.

name: Navel Orange
description: Sourced from the famous orchards of Nagpur, these Navel oranges are seedless, easy to peel, and bursting with sweet, tangy citrus flavor. A perfect and healthy treat to boost your immunity, they are also excellent for fresh juices.

name: Strawberry
description: A taste of summer in every bite. These sweet, fragrant strawberries are known for their vibrant red color and juicy texture. Perfect for topping desserts, blending into smoothies, or enjoying on their own as a healthy snack.

name: Pomegranate
description: Discover the treasure within each pomegranate. These ruby-red arils (seeds) are bursting with a unique sweet-tart flavor and are packed with powerful antioxidants and vitamins. A superfood that's both healthy and delicious.

name: Green Grapes
description: Enjoy the simple pleasure of sweet and crisp seedless green grapes. Each grape is plump and juicy, making them a perfect, healthy snack for all ages. They are also a great addition to fruit salads or cheese boards.

name: Alphonso Mango
description: Indulge in the unparalleled taste of the 'King of Fruits'. Our authentic Ratnagiri Alphonso mangoes are celebrated for their rich, creamy, non-fibrous texture and intensely sweet flavor with hints of citrus. Each mango is carefully selected to ensure a premium experience.

name: Pineapple
description: Bring a taste of the tropics to your home with our golden-ripe pineapples. With a perfect balance of tangy and sweet, this fruit is excellent for juices, salads, desserts, or even grilling to bring out its sweetness.

name: Watermelon
description: Slice into the ultimate summer refreshment. Our watermelons are incredibly hydrating, sweet, and juicy. With its bright red flesh and low calorie count, it's the perfect guilt-free treat for hot days.

name: Kiwi
description: With its fuzzy brown exterior and vibrant green flesh speckled with tiny black seeds, the kiwi is a true nutrient powerhouse. Its unique tangy-sweet flavor makes it a fantastic addition to fruit salads, smoothies, or as a simple, healthy snack.

name: Papaya
description: A succulent tropical fruit known for its soft, buttery consistency and sweet, musky flavor. The orange flesh of the papaya is not only delicious but also rich in enzymes like papain, which aids in digestion.

name: Pear
description: Enjoy the classic, delicately sweet flavor and buttery texture of a ripe Bartlett pear. This wholesome snack is packed with dietary fiber and essential nutrients, making it a healthy and satisfying choice.
